mapper.update:
update document
projectId = #{projectid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
documentName = #{documentname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createPeople = #{createpeople,jdbcType=INTEGER},
createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
keyword = #{keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fileName = #{filename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
enclosure = #{enclosure,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update document set projectId = #{projectid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, documentName = #{documentname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createPeople = #{createpeople,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, keyword = #{keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fileName = #{filename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enclosure = #{enclosure,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select do.id,do.documentName,do.type,tu.name AS creaePeople,do.createTime from LEFT JOIN t_user tu ON tu.id=do.createPeople
